data.lyric:
[ti:Fighting Demons (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD]
[al:Legends Never Die (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Fighting Demons (Explicit) - Juice WRLD
[00:02.66]Lyrics by：Nick Mira/Darien Marchand/Jarad Higgins
[00:05.32]Composed by：Nick Mira/Darien Marchand/Jarad Higgins
[00:07.98]Run away
[00:08.69]In fear of me dying today
[00:24.73]Yeah I run away
[00:26.57]In fear of me dying today ah
[00:30.55]And I'm not the same
[00:32.38]Who said I was subject to change
[00:36.56]My demons are breakin' out of their cage
[00:39.39]I'm praying that I see another day
[00:41.25]Chill chill
[00:41.81]I said my demons are breakin' out of their cage
[00:44.50]On my knees I pray for better days
[00:47.28]Chip chip cheerio everything's all good right
[00:50.15]I got rich I got rich I'm livin' that fast life
[00:53.24]Couple M's in my bank account I got cash right
[00:56.04]And that's supposed to make me happy
[00:57.77]I got a couple questions
[00:58.69]How come that s**t don't ever make me happy
[01:00.68]Money give me an erection
[01:01.62]But that don't mean it's gon' be everlasting
[01:03.58]Yeah I know it's a blessing
[01:04.48]But how come it always feel like the devil plottin'
[01:06.82]And the devil watchin'
[01:07.94]He see me buyin' all these watches
[01:09.36]Benjamin Franklin in my pockets
[01:10.92]Ooh been a year of the glitz and the glam
[01:13.53]And the TV channels brain's going scramble
[01:16.83]Scrambling sometimes 'cause this s**t is hard to handle
[01:19.67]Demons in my heart
[01:20.61]Yeah
[01:20.82]They destroy me like a vandal
[01:23.03]Ah
[01:24.15]Take my hand
[01:27.11]Don't give up
[01:30.03]Take my hand
[01:33.12]Don't give up
[01:35.36]Yeah I run away
[01:37.18]In fear of me dying today ah
[01:41.29]And I'm not the same
[01:43.10]Who said I was subject to change
[01:47.15]My demons are breakin' out of their cage
[01:50.02]I'm praying that I see another day
[01:51.88]Chill chill
[01:52.37]I said my demons are breakin' out of their cage
[01:55.00]On my knees I pray for better days
[01:57.97]Karma ain't what you think it is
[02:00.94]Super stressed still handle all of my business
[02:03.81]Do the best I can yes I can
[02:07.14]Yes I am misfortune
[02:10.19]I know in the dark they be lurking
[02:12.78]Why
[02:13.05]Same way they lurk in your head when they get in your mind
[02:16.30]You don't wanna know what they're tryin' to find
[02:19.00]I'll protect your soul
[02:22.10]Ah
[02:23.13]Take my hand
[02:26.04]Don't give up
[02:28.97]Take my hand
[02:31.99]Don't give up
[02:34.21]Yeah I run away
[02:36.27]In fear of me dying today ah
[02:40.20]And I'm not the same
[02:42.06]Who said I was subject to change
[02:45.99]My demons are breakin' out of their cage
[02:48.87]I'm praying that I see another day
[02:50.75]Chill chill
[02:51.09]I said my demons are breakin' out of their cage
[02:53.94]On my knees I pray for better days
data.trans:
[ti:Fighting Demons (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD]
[al:Legends Never Die (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.66]//
[00:05.32]//
[00:07.98]逃跑
[00:08.69]害怕我今天就死去
[00:24.73]我拼命逃
[00:26.57]害怕我今天就死去
[00:30.55]我不一样
[00:32.38]谁说我会变
[00:36.56]我的心魔即将破笼而出
[00:39.39]我希望我能活到明天
[00:41.25]冷静
[00:41.81]我说 我的心魔即将破笼而出
[00:44.50]我双膝跪地 祈祷过上好日子
[00:47.28]再见吧 一切都很好 对吗
[00:50.15]我有钱 我过着浮华的生活
[00:53.24]银行存了几百万 我有钞票 对吧
[00:56.04]这应该让我感到高兴才对
[00:57.77]我有几个问题
[00:58.69]这玩意儿怎么就让我高兴不起来呢
[01:00.68]金钱给了我一种快感
[01:01.62]但这种感觉并不能长久存在
[01:03.58]我知道这是一种幸福
[01:04.48]但我怎么总感觉是恶魔在密谋害我
[01:06.82]恶魔在监视着我
[01:07.94]他看到我买手表
[01:09.36]口袋里全是百元大钞
[01:10.92]这种光鲜亮丽的日子已经过了一年
[01:13.53]电视播放着乱七八糟的东西 让人脑海一片混乱
[01:16.83]有时候很恼火 因为这玩意儿 很难掌控
[01:19.67]恶魔在我心中
[01:20.61]//
[01:20.82]他们将我摧毁
[01:23.03]//
[01:24.15]牵着我的手
[01:27.11]不要放弃
[01:30.03]牵着我的手
[01:33.12]不要放弃
[01:35.36]我拼命逃
[01:37.18]害怕我今天就死去
[01:41.29]我不一样
[01:43.10]谁说我会变
[01:47.15]我的心魔即将破笼而出
[01:50.02]我希望我能活到明天
[01:51.88]冷静
[01:52.37]我说 我的心魔即将破笼而出
[01:55.00]我双膝跪地 祈祷过上好日子
[01:57.97]因果报应并不是你想的那样
[02:00.94]压力超大 依然要处理我的所有事情
[02:03.81]尽我所能 没错 我可以
[02:07.14]没错 我很不幸
[02:10.19]我知道他们在黑暗中潜伏
[02:12.78]为什么
[02:13.05]就和他们在你脑海里潜伏着是一样的感觉
[02:16.30]你不想知道他们在找什么
[02:19.00]我会保护你的灵魂
[02:22.10]//
[02:23.13]牵着我的手
[02:26.04]不要放弃
[02:28.97]牵着我的手
[02:31.99]不要放弃
[02:34.21]我拼命逃
[02:36.27]害怕我今天就死去
[02:40.20]我不一样
[02:42.06]谁说我会变
[02:45.99]我的心魔即将破笼而出
[02:48.87]我希望我能活到明天
[02:50.75]冷静
[02:51.09]我说 我的心魔即将破笼而出
[02:53.94]我双膝跪地 祈祷过上好日子
